abstract: Sorry, e-book readers. There will be no new Kindle for Christmas, the company says.
snippet: Sorry, e-book readers. There will be no new Kindle for Christmas, the company says.
lead_paragraph: Talk of a new version of the Kindle e-book reader, aimed at college students, has been echoing around the blogosphere and has even reached your dutifully vacationing Bits correspondent. I asked Craig Berman, Amazon’s chief spokesman, for comment on a possible Kindle 2.0, and Thursday he responded.

headline.main: Extinguish the Rumors: No New Amazon Kindle This Year
